customtkinter.name: CustomTkinter (Default)
customtkinter.init_method:
def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.geometry('{window_width}x{window_height}')
        self.title('Exported Virtual Window')
        
        self.resizable({resizable},{resizable})
        self.virtual_window = ctk.CTkFrame(self, {window_params})
        self.virtual_window.pack(expand=True, fill='both')
        self.generic_widget_creator()

tkinter.name: Tkinter (Standard)
tkinter.imports:
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import ttk
tkinter.init_method:
def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.geometry('{window_width}x{window_height}')
        self.title('Exported Virtual Window')
        
        self.resizable({resizable_bool},{resizable_bool})
        self.virtual_window = tk.Frame(self, {window_params})
        self.virtual_window.pack(expand=True, fill='both')
        self.generic_widget_creator()

html.name: HTML/CSS/JS
html.imports:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Exported Virtual Window</title>
    <style>
        body {{
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
        }}
        .virtual-window {{
            width: {window_width}px;
            height: {window_height}px;
            position: relative;
            background-color: {bg_color};
            margin: 20px auto;
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
        }}
        .widget {{
            position: absolute;
        }}
    </style>
</head>
<body>

pyside6.name: PySide6 (Qt)
pyside6.imports:
from PySide6.QtWidgets import QApplication, QMainWindow, QWidget, QVBoxLayout
from PySide6.QtWidgets import QPushButton, QLabel, QLineEdit, QTextEdit
from PySide6.QtCore import Qt
import sys
pyside6.init_method:
def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.setWindowTitle('Exported Virtual Window')
        self.setGeometry(100, 100, {window_width}, {window_height})
        
        self.central_widget = QWidget()
        self.setCentralWidget(self.central_widget)
        self.setup_widgets()
pyside6.footer:
if __name__ == '__main__':
    app = QApplication(sys.argv)
    window = App()
    window.show()
    sys.exit(app.exec())
